title: The saints hony-comb, full of divine truths, touching both Christian belief, and a Christians life, in two centuries. By Richard Gove.
author: Gove, R. (Richard), 1587-1668.
publisher: Printed for Richard Royston at the Angel in Ivy-lane,
notes: The words "Christian .. life," are bracketed together on title page with "touching both" to the left reading up.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
